lead_paragraph: The rapper J. Cole, who performed at S.O.B.’s on Tuesday night, is a supporting star in Jay-Z’s circle who has come into his own as a headliner.
snippet: The rapper J. Cole, who performed at S.O.B.’s on Tuesday night, is a supporting star in Jay-Z’s circle who has come into his own as a headliner.

headline.main: Stepping From Jay-Z’s Shadow Into Spotlight
headline.seo: At S.O.B.’s, J. Cole Steps From Jay-Z’s Shadow
headline.print_headline: Stepping From Jay-Z’s Shadow Into Spotlight
